Question: What is the title of the question that has an accepted answer which received more than 100 upvotes, and what tag is associated with this question?
Cypher:
MATCH (question:Question)-[tagged:TAGGED]->(tag:Tag), (answer:Answer)-[answered:ANSWERED]->(question)
WHERE question.accepted_answer_id = answer.uuid AND answer.score > 100 AND answer.is_accepted = TRUE
RETURN question, tagged, tag, answer, answered, question.title, tag.name
Rewrite: What is the name of the question with an accepted answer garnering over 100 upvotes, and which tag is linked to that question?

Question: Can you display the names of users who commented on a question titled 'How to optimize SQL query?', and also show the scores of their comments?
Cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[commented:COMMENTED]->(comment:Comment)-[commentedOn:COMMENTED_ON]->(question:Question)
WHERE question.title = "How to optimize SQL query?"
RETURN user, commented, comment, commentedOn, question, user.display_name, comment.score
Rewrite: Could you show the names of users who have commented on the question 'How to optimize SQL query?' and display the scores of their comments as well?

Question: List the user who provided an answer to the question 'What is graph theory?', and include the link to the user's profile along with the link of the answer.
Cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[provided:PROVIDED]->(answer:Answer)-[answered:ANSWERED]->(question:Question)
WHERE question.title = "What is graph theory?"
RETURN user, provided, answer, answered, question, user.display_name, user.uuid, answer.link
Rewrite: Provide the name of the user who responded to the question 'What is graph theory?', and supply the corresponding links to both the user's profile and the answer.

Question: Identify the tags associated with questions that received answers from a user named 'John Doe' and provide the links to those tags.
Cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[:PROVIDED]->(answer:Answer)-[:ANSWERED]->(question:Question)-[tagged:TAGGED]->(tag:Tag)
WHERE user.display_name = "John Doe"
RETURN user, answer, question, tagged, tag, tag.link
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[relation4:PROVIDED]->(answer:Answer)-[relation5:ANSWERED]->(question:Question)-[tagged:TAGGED]->(tag:Tag)
WHERE user.display_name = "John Doe"
RETURN relation5, relation4, user, answer, question, tagged, tag, tag.link
Rewrite: Locate and list the tags linked to questions answered by 'John Doe', including the URLs for those tags.

Question: For the comments made on the question with UUID 12345, can you tell me the authors of these comments and the scores of the answers related to this question?
Cypher:
MATCH (commentingUser:User)-[commented:COMMENTED]->(comment:Comment)-[commentedOn:COMMENTED_ON]->(targetQuestion:Question {uuid: 12345}), 
      (answer:Answer)-[answered:ANSWERED]->(targetQuestion)
RETURN commentingUser, commented, comment, commentedOn, targetQuestion, answer, answered, commentingUser.display_name, comment.score
Rewrite: Could you provide the names of the individuals who commented on the question identified by UUID 12345 and the scores of the answers associated with that question?

Question: Show me the display names of users who commented on answers accepted for questions tagged 'JavaScript', and include the actual comment contents.
Cypher:
MATCH (commenter:User)-[commented:COMMENTED]->(comment:Comment)-[commentedOn:COMMENTED_ON]->(answer:Answer)-[answered:ANSWERED]->(question:Question)<-[:TAGGED]-(tag:Tag)
WHERE tag.name="JavaScript" AND answer.is_accepted = TRUE
RETURN commenter, commented, comment, commentedOn, answer, answered, question, tag, commenter.display_name, comment.body_markdown
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (commenter:User)-[commented:COMMENTED]->(comment:Comment)-[commentedOn:COMMENTED_ON]->(answer:Answer)-[answered:ANSWERED]->(question:Question)<-[relation8:TAGGED]-(tag:Tag)
WHERE tag.name="JavaScript" AND answer.is_accepted = TRUE
RETURN relation8, commenter, commented, comment, commentedOn, answer, answered, question, tag, commenter.display_name, comment.body_markdown

Question: Which users have asked a question and also provided an answer to another question within the same day, according to the 'ASKED' and 'PROVIDED' relationships?
Cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[asked:ASKED]->(question:Question),
      (user)-[provided:PROVIDED]->(answer:Answer)-[:ANSWERED]->(otherQuestion:Question)
WHERE date(question.creation_date) = date(otherQuestion.creation_date)
RETURN user, asked, question, provided, answer, otherQuestion
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[asked:ASKED]->(question:Question),
      (user)-[provided:PROVIDED]->(answer:Answer)-[relation6:ANSWERED]->(otherQuestion:Question)
WHERE date(question.creation_date) = date(otherQuestion.creation_date)
RETURN relation6, user, asked, question, provided, answer, otherQuestion
Rewrite: Which users posed a question and also supplied an answer to a different question on the same day, as indicated by the 'ASKED' and 'PROVIDED' relationships?

Question: List all instances where users commented on their own answers, including the comment content and the related question's title.
Cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[provided:PROVIDED]->(answer:Answer)-[:ANSWERED]->(question:Question), (user)-[commented:COMMENTED]->(comment:Comment)-[:COMMENTED_ON]->(answer)
RETURN user, provided, answer, commented, comment, question, comment.link, question.title
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[provided:PROVIDED]->(answer:Answer)-[relation5:ANSWERED]->(question:Question), (user)-[commented:COMMENTED]->(comment:Comment)-[relation7:COMMENTED_ON]->(answer)
RETURN relation7, relation5, user, provided, answer, commented, comment, question, comment.link, question.title

Question: Find all users who have both answered and commented on the same question and list the corresponding question titles.
Cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[provided:PROVIDED]->(answer:Answer)-[answered:ANSWERED]->(question:Question),
      (user)-[commented:COMMENTED]->(comment:Comment)-[commentedOn:COMMENTED_ON]->(question)
RETURN user, provided, answer, answered, question, commented, comment, commentedOn, question.title
Rewrite: Retrieve the titles of questions on which users have both commented and provided answers.

Question: Identify relationships where a user tagged a question, provided an answer to the same question, and include the tag name in the results.
Cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[asked:ASKED]->(question:Question)-[tagged:TAGGED]->(tag:Tag), (user)-[provided:PROVIDED]->(answer:Answer)-[answered:ANSWERED]->(question)
RETURN user, asked, question, tagged, tag, provided, answer, answered, tag.name
Rewrite: Find instances where a user both tagged a question and answered that question, ensuring to display the tag name in the output.

Question: Show the link to the questions where 'Sam' has both commented and provided an answer, and include the scores of these answers.
Cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[asked:ASKED]->(question:Question)<-[answered:ANSWERED]-(answer:Answer), (user)-[commented:COMMENTED]->(comment:Comment)-[commented_on:COMMENTED_ON]->(question)
WHERE user.display_name = "Sam"
RETURN user, asked, question, answered, answer, commented, comment, commented_on, question.link, answer.score
Rewrite: Display the URL for the questions on which 'Sam' has both commented and answered, and show the scores of those answers.

Question: Can you indicate all the occasions when a user commented on an answer they provided for the same question and list the date these comments were made?
Cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[provided:PROVIDED]->(answer:Answer)-[answered:ANSWERED]->(question:Question), (user)-[commented:COMMENTED]->(comment:Comment)-[commentedOn:COMMENTED_ON]->(answer)
RETURN user, provided, answer, answered, question, commented, comment, commentedOn, comment.creation_date

Question: What is the average score of comments on questions which have been tagged as 'Machine Learning'?
Cypher:
MATCH (comment:Comment)-[:COMMENTED_ON]->(question:Question)-[:TAGGED]->(tag:Tag)
WHERE tag.name="Machine Learning"
RETURN AVG(comment.score)
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (comment:Comment)-[relation3:COMMENTED_ON]->(question:Question)-[relation4:TAGGED]->(tag:Tag)
WHERE tag.name="Machine Learning"
RETURN AVG(comment.score)
Rewrite: What is the mean score of comments for questions tagged with 'Machine Learning'?

Question: For questions tagged 'JavaScript', what is the maximum view count among those that received at least two answers?
Cypher:
MATCH (question:Question)-[:TAGGED]->(tag:Tag)
WHERE tag.name="JavaScript" AND question.answer_count >= 2
RETURN MAX(question.view_count)
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (question:Question)-[relation2:TAGGED]->(tag:Tag)
WHERE tag.name="JavaScript" AND question.answer_count >= 2
RETURN MAX(question.view_count)
Rewrite: What is the highest number of views for questions with the 'JavaScript' tag that have received at least two answers?

Question: Calculate the average number of comments received by questions that were asked by users with more than 10 questions to their name.
Cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[asked:ASKED]->(question:Question)
WITH user, COUNT(question) AS totalQuestions
WHERE totalQuestions > 10
MATCH (question)-[receivedComment:COMMENTED_ON]->(comment:Comment)
WITH user, AVG(COUNT(comment)) as averageComments
RETURN averageComments
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[asked:ASKED]->(question:Question)
WITH user, COUNT(question) AS totalQuestions
WHERE totalQuestions > 10
MATCH (question)-[receivedComment:COMMENTED_ON]-(comment:Comment)
WITH user, AVG(COUNT(comment)) as averageComments
RETURN averageComments

Question: Compute the average score of answers to questions which both have the tag 'Python' and were answered by the same user.
Cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[provided:PROVIDED]->(answer:Answer)-[answered:ANSWERED]->(question:Question)-[tagged:TAGGED]->(tag:Tag)
WHERE tag.name="Python"
WITH user, AVG(answer.score) AS averageScore
RETURN averageScore
Rewrite: Calculate the mean score of responses to questions that are tagged with 'Python' and were replied to by the same user.

Question: Determine the minimum score of all comments made on accepted answers of questions tagged 'Database'.
Cypher:
MATCH (comment:Comment)-[:COMMENTED_ON]->(answer:Answer)-[:ANSWERED]->(question:Question)-[:TAGGED]->(tag:Tag)
WHERE tag.name="Database" AND question.accepted_answer_id=answer.uuid
RETURN MIN(comment.score)
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (comment:Comment)-[relation4:COMMENTED_ON]->(answer:Answer)-[relation5:ANSWERED]->(question:Question)-[relation6:TAGGED]->(tag:Tag)
WHERE tag.name="Database" AND question.accepted_answer_id=answer.uuid
RETURN MIN(comment.score)

Question: How many questions have been asked with the tag 'Java' which have also been answered by users with a score greater than 100 on their answers?
Cypher:
MATCH (question:Question)-[:TAGGED]->(tag:Tag), (answer:Answer)-[:ANSWERED]->(question), (user:User)-[:PROVIDED]->(answer)
WHERE tag.name="Java" AND answer.score > 100
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT question)
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (question:Question)-[relation4:TAGGED]->(tag:Tag), (answer:Answer)-[relation5:ANSWERED]->(question), (user:User)-[relation6:PROVIDED]->(answer)
WHERE tag.name="Java" AND answer.score > 100
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT question)
Rewrite: How many queries tagged 'Java' have received responses from users whose answers have a score above 100?
